page.title: 07A Typical Saturday
page.content: I live in a small village in Leicestershire called Heather. My name is Nigel and I'm going to tell you about a typical Saturday in my life. I get up at 8.30, have a cup of tea, have a shower, get dressed and for breakfast I have kippers. "Where do you get them from?" I hear you ask. Well, my Dad works for Amy Roadstone Corporation and he has to travel to different places. One is Lowestoft, where he is able to buy really tasty ones. After breakfast I practise on my piano and watch television until dinner time. In the afternoon I make and paint a model ship called H.M.S. Conqueror. For tea I have salad. Then I spend fifteen minutes practising on my piano. Afterwards I watch the television until 10.00, then I go to bed.
